current.title_corona: We sincerely hope you and your loved ones are staying safe and well. Let us come together stronger by taking care of the ones we love.
current.text_corona:
We believe positive energy and happiness are important, especially during this time.

As a company, we have taken measures to protect the health and safety of our staff, customers, and communities. Our Online Shop remains open and we are happy to assist you with any questions you may have via email- customerservice@enchantedfinejewelry.com.

Our community comes first in everything we do. To help support them, we are pleased to announce 3% of sales starting from April 1st will be donated to charity.

settings.title: Bridal Jewellery
settings.text: The future is not set in stone, but rather in diamonds and 14k two toned gold. Crafted with precision and love, our bridal collection pays homage to authenticity and celebration of true love.

settings.title: Talk about your business

settings.content-paragraph: Pure of heart, kind and graceful, Cinderella believes in dreams that come true. When her father dies, Cinderella is treated as a servant in her own home by her wicked stepmother and stepsisters.
Once upon a time, in a faraway land, adventure is calling. There are new discoveries every day when you explore your world and let courage lead the way.
Tinker Bell is a pixie who lives in Neverland. Feisty and sassy, she’s also a loyal friend to Peter Pan
Princess Aurora is cursed at her Christening by Maleficent, who declares that before the sun sets on Aurora’s 16th birthday she will die by pricking her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel.
In the Sultan’s palace deep in the Agrabah Desert, Princess Jasmine dreams of making her own choices and experiencing life beyond the palace walls.
As bold as a rose, independent and spirited, Belle knows that true beauty lies within. Belle loves books and dreams of an adventure in the great wide somewhere!
Craving for a world that existed above the sea, Princess Ariel of Kingdom Atlantica is fearless and believes in daring adventure that awaited her!
Elegant, powerful and selfless, Elsa has the strength to overcome fear and learn to be loved. Elsa has the power to create ice and snow.
With her gentle grace, Snow White charms every creature in the kingdom except her jealous and vain stepmother, the Queen.

When war breaks out between the Chinese Empire and the Huns, Mulan bravely does the unthinkable to protect her aging father. Disguised as a male soldier, she takes his place in battle. At the army camp, Mulan’s fierce determination earns her the respect of everyone.

settings.short-desc: Encrusted with deep cuts diamonds surrounded by gold plating, this beautiful enchanted ring is meant to shine!
Encrusted with black diamonds with diamond cut stone in center will add the spotlight!
Crafted with gold and dazzling diamonds, its a perfect combination!

settings.city-heading: It all started in the beautiful city of Agrabah

settings.small-heading: A Whole New World of love & adventure!
settings.big-content: In the Sultan’s palace deep in the Agrabah Desert, Princess Jasmine dreams of making her own choices and experiencing life beyond the palace walls. She believes she should be able to live her own life and defy a law that proclaims she must marry a prince by her next birthday. She disguises herself as a commoner and sneaks out to the marketplace.

settings.collection-desc: A new world awaits you when you follow your heart. Dream of your next adventure with Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry rings, necklaces and earrings with Jasmine’s exotic lotus. Fairy tale wishes take flight with Jasmine’s sparkling magic lamp in diamond and blue topaz collection inspired by Disney’s Aladdin

settings.short-desc: Crafted with rose gold & round cut diamonds encasing the mystical journey, Jasmine endured to learn about the world.
Crafted with rose gold & round cut diamonds encasing the mystical journey, Jasmine endured to learn about the world.

settings.top-content: Since 1837, Tiffany has maintained the highest standards in design, materials and craftsmanship, creating jewelry that has been passed down for generations. With proper care, you can preserve the beauty of your Tiffany jewelry for years to come.
settings.heading: Jewelry Cleaning & Repair
settings.sub-heading: For love is that magic
settings.paragraph: Bring your Tiffany jewelry in for professional servicing to protect its beauty for years. From ring resizing and necklace repair to loose stones and watch battery replacement, our experts are knowledgeable and experienced in all aspects of jewelry care.

settings.content-text:
All shipments are insured, so you can rest assured.

  • Free International Priority shipping on all orders.

Currently we are shipping to the following countries:

  • Australia, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom,

All shipments include Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry Certificate of Authenticity and come in a beautiful Enchanted packaging.

If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund or exchange it within 30 days of the shipping date. Returns, including free gift(s), must be unworn, in the state that you received them, with the original packaging.

International customers will need to pay for return shipping. For international returns, return shipping and insurance are the responsibility of the customer.

Refunds may take up to two weeks for processing, once we receive the package.

settings.content-heading: The Apple Privacy Policy was updated on August 29, 2019.
settings.content-text:
Your privacy is important to Apple so we’ve developed a Privacy Policy that covers how we collect, use, disclose, transfer, and store your personal information.

In addition to this Privacy Policy, we provide data and privacy information imbedded in our products connected with our Data & Privacy Icon for certain features that ask to use your personal information.

You can review this information before enabling these features, in Settings related to those features and/or online at apple.com/legal/privacy. Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our privacy practices and contact us if you have any questions.

settings.content-heading: Collection and Use of Personal Information
settings.content-text:
Personal information is data that can be used to identify or contact a single person.

You may be asked to provide your personal information anytime you are in contact with Apple or an Apple affiliated company. Apple and its affiliates may share this personal information with each other and use it consistent with this Privacy Policy. They may also combine it with other information to provide and improve our products, services, content, and advertising. You are not required to provide the personal information that we have requested, but, if you chose not to do so, in many cases we will not be able to provide you with our products or services or respond to any queries you may have.

Here are some examples of the types of personal information Apple may collect and how we may use it:

• When you create an Apple ID, apply for commercial credit, purchase a product, download a software update, register for a class at an Apple Retail Store, connect to our services, contact us including by social media or participate in an online survey, we may collect a variety of information, including your name, mailing address, phone number, email address, contact preferences, device identifiers, IP address, location information, credit card information and profile information where the contact is via social media.
  • When you share your content with family and friends using Apple products, send gift certificates and products, or invite others to participate in Apple services or forums, Apple may collect the information you provide about those people such as name, mailing address, email address, and phone number. Apple will use such information to fulfill your requests, provide the relevant product or service, or for anti-fraud purposes.
  • In certain jurisdictions, we may ask for a government issued ID in limited circumstances including when setting up a wireless account and activating your device, for the purpose of extending commercial credit, managing reservations, or as required by law.

settings.content-heading: How we use your personal information
settings.content-text:
• We may process your personal information: for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, with your consent, for compliance with a legal obligation to which Apple is subject, for the performance of a contract to which you are party, in order to protect your vital interests, or when we have assessed it is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by Apple or a third party to whom it may be necessary to disclose information. If you have questions about this legal basis you can contact the European Data Protection Officer.
  • The personal information we collect allows us to keep you posted on Apple’s latest product announcements, software updates, and upcoming events. If you don’t want to be on our mailing list, you can opt-out anytime by updating your preferences.
  • We also use personal information to help us create, develop, operate, deliver, and improve our products, services, content and advertising, and for loss prevention and anti-fraud purposes. We may also use your personal information for account and network security purposes, including in order to protect our services for the benefit of all our users, and pre-screening or scanning uploaded content for potentially illegal content, including child sexual exploitation material. Where we use your information for anti-fraud purposes it arises from the conduct of an online transaction with us. We limit our uses of data for anti-fraud purposes to those which are strictly necessary and within our assessed legitimate interests to protect our customers and our services. For certain online transactions we may also validate the information provided by you with publicly accessible sources.
  • We may use your personal information, including date of birth, to verify identity, assist with identification of users, and to determine appropriate services. For example, we may use date of birth to determine the age of Apple ID account holders.
  • From time to time, we may use your personal information to send important notices, such as communications about purchases and changes to our terms, conditions, and policies. Because this information is important to your interaction with Apple, you may not opt out of receiving these communications.
  • We may also use personal information for internal purposes such as auditing, data analysis, and research to improve Apple’s products, services, and customer communications.
  • If you enter into a sweepstake, contest, or similar promotion we may use the information you provide to administer those programs.
  • If you apply for a position at Apple or we receive your information in connection with a potential role at Apple, we may use your information to evaluate your candidacy and to contact you. If you are a candidate, you will receive more information about how Apple handles candidate personal information at the time of application.
This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from www.enchantedfinejewellery.co.uk (the “Site”, “We”, “Us” or Our”).

When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as “Device Information.”

We collect Device Information using the following technologies:

  • “Cookies” are data files that are placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies, and how to disable cookies, visit http://www.allaboutcookies.org.
  • “Log files” track actions occurring on the Site, and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps.
  • “Web beacons,” “tags,” and “pixels” are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Site.

Additionally when you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the Site, we may collect certain information from you, including your name, date of birth, billing address, shipping address, purchase history, payment information including credit card numbers, email address, and phone number. We refer to this information as “Order Information.”

We also collect your marketing preferences, including any consents you have given us when you subscribe to our newsletter or set up an online account

If you contact us by phone, email or otherwise we keep a record of the correspondence

When we talk about “Personal Information” in this Privacy Policy, we are talking both about Device Information and Order Information.

Hotjar uses cookies to process information including standard internet log information and details of the visitor’s behavioral patterns upon visiting our site. This is done to provide you with a better experience, and to facilitate the use of certain functions. Cookies are small data files transferred onto computers or devices by sites for record-keeping purposes and to enhance functionality on our site. Hotjar stores this information in a pseudonymized user profile. Hotjar does not process this information to identify individual users or to match it with further data on an individual user.

Cookies are stored on your individual device and you have full control over their use. You may deactivate or restrict the transmission of cookies by changing the settings of your web browser. Cookies that are already stored may be deleted at any time. Should you visit Hotjar’s site with cookies deactivated, you may possibly not be able to use all of the functions on our site to the full extent.

The data that Hotjar processes for a Hotjar Enabled Site is processed by us on behalf of our customer, and our privacy practices will be governed by the contracts that we have in place with our customers, not this Privacy Policy. This section should always be read in conjunction with the specific Privacy Policy of the Hotjar Enabled Site which will contain further details regarding the processing of your personal data by the Hotjar Enabled Site.

You can get more information about Hotjar by visiting the ‘about Hotjar’ section of our support site. Hotjar assists its users/customers in providing their end users with a better experience and service as well as assist them in diagnosing technical problems and analyzing user trends. Most importantly, through Hotjar’s services, the functionality of the Hotjar Enabled Site can be improved, making them more user-friendly, more valuable, and simpler to use for the end users.

You may opt-out from having Hotjar collect your information when visiting a Hotjar Enabled Site at any time by visiting our Opt-out page (https://www.hotjar.com/privacy/do-not-track/) and clicking ‘Disable Hotjar’ or enabling Do Not Track (DNT) in your browser.

settings.content-heading: HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
settings.content-text:
We use the Order Information that we collect generally to fulfill any orders placed through the Site (including processing your payment information, arranging for shipping, and providing you with invoices and/or order confirmations). Additionally, we use this Order Information to:

  • Communicate with you including by email and SMS;
  • Verifying your identity;
  • Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud;
  • We use information provided by you to investigate any complaints received from you about the website, product or otherwise
  • When in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.

We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns, advertising and retargeting).

We use the information provided by you to create a personal profile of your preferences. This information is used to personalize content for you so you only receive content and communication that is relevant to you.

When you visit our site we store the name of your internet service provider, the website from which you visited us from, the parts of our site you visit, the date and duration of your visit, and information from the device (device type, operating system, screen resolution, language, country you are located in, and web browser type) you used during your visit. While we process your IP address during the duration of your session, the IP address is truncated and thereby de-identified before it is ever written to disk on our servers. This is done by removing the last octet of your full IP address.

We process this usage data to facilitate your access to our services (e.g. to adjust our services to the device you are using), and to recognize and stop any misuse which is in our legitimate interest. The legal basis for this data processing is Article 6(1)(f) GDPR. We also process usage data in an aggregated or de-identified form for statistical purposes and to improve our site.

We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above. For example, we use Shopify to power our online store--you can read more about how Shopify uses your Personal Information here: https://www.shopify.com/legal/privacy. We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site--you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (“NAI”) educational page at http://www.networkadvertising.org/understanding-online-advertising/how-does-it-work.

You can opt out of targeted advertising by:
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads
GOOGLE - https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous
BING - https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads

Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out portal at: http://optout.aboutads.info/.
Please note that we do not alter our Site’s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.

If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.

Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above. Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.
When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.
The Site is not intended for individuals under the age 18.
We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at khurram.abdulla@renaissanceglobal.com or by mail using the details provided below:

3 East, 54th Street, 603, New York, NY, 10022, United States

settings.paragraph: Enchanted has operated at the pinnacle of the fine jewellery industry since its foundation in 1960, continuously striving to create an exceptional world of rare talent, expertise and skill. From the master craftsmen in our world-famous atelier, to our exceptional designers, our store personnel or our head office team, all of Enchanted’s staff are leaders in their field. Our reputation for excellence was forged not by chance but by sharing knowledge, seeking out talent and creating Enchanted ambassadors and educators at every level of our company.
Do more than you ever thought possible. Have more impact than you ever imagined.

This is where some of the world’s smartest, most passionate people create the world’s most innovative products and experiences. Join us and you’ll do the best work of your life — and make a difference in other people’s lives.

settings.heading: Our Values
settings.sub-heading: For love is that magic
settings.paragraph: Graff was founded as a family business and remains family-run, even today, as a global brand. Our devotion to this family ethos extends to our customers. We become, for however brief, part of some of the most important moments in their lives. We welcome our customers into a rare universe, inviting them to discover the most fabulous jewels in the world, and we ensure that every interaction with and experience of the Graff brand is, much like our diamonds, flawless.

settings.heading: Our People
settings.sub-heading: A bond beyond ages
settings.paragraph: From the founders, to the designers, to the craftsmen, to the staff in-store, Graff has developed a dedicated team of experts. We support our employees so that they can innovate and evolve, while nurturing their talent and developing their expertise. If you’re looking to join a world-class team at the forefront of cutting and polishing innovation, pioneering design and remarkable retail expansion, we invite you to connect with us.

settings.slider-subtitle: Be a part of our magical journey

settings.heading: You can reach out to us
settings.sub-heading: DO REACH OUT TO RENAISSANCE GLOBAL.

settings.small-heading: "There is a world where hope and dreams can last for all time"
settings.big-content: Craving a world that existed above the sea, Princess Ariel of Atlantica is fearless and believes that daring adventure that awaits her!

settings.small-heading: "You're the one, the one I have been looking for."
settings.big-content: Beneath the moonlit sky, Ariel and Eric rowed among the beautiful coral and sparkling fireflies that created the perfect setting for their romantic adventure. Overwhelmed with the magic in the air Princess Ariel and Eric, fall in love!

settings.small-heading: “The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.”
settings.big-content: When war breaks out between the Chinese Empire and the Huns, Mulan bravely does the unthinkable to protect her aging father. Disguised as a male soldier, she takes his place in battle. At the army camp, Mulan’s fierce determination earns her the respect of everyone.

settings.collection-desc: Inspired by Mulan’s courage and determination, our beautiful collection of plum blossom designs flower in Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry. The Rhodolite garnet and diamonds sparkle like fireworks, reminding you that you can do anything you put your mind to!

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: “THE FLOWER THAT BLOOMS IN ADVERSITY IS THE MOST RARE AND BEAUTIFUL OF ALL.”

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION

settings.small-heading: “If you dream a thing more than once, it’s sure to come true.”
settings.big-content: Princess Aurora is cursed at her Christening by Maleficent, who declares that before the sun sets on Aurora’s 16th birthday she will die by pricking her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel. To prevent this from coming true, the king orders all spindles destroyed and places Aurora into protective custody in the forest with three good fairies, Flora, Fauna, and Merryweather under a pseudonym, Briar Rose. Unaware of her true identity, she optimistically believes that her dreams of a bright future will come true.

settings.collection-desc: Make your dreams come true with Aurora’s inspired diamond and pink tourmaline gemstone that are symbolic of Aurora’s grace and kindness of heart!

settings.short-desc: A crown as graceful as a flower petal, should belong on the hand of someone equally as elegant!
Bright Diamonds and rose gold, this beautiful Aurora inspired piece will look wonderful on your true love!
With this ring, tell her more than ‘ I love you”. Tell her that no matter what you’ll always be by her side!

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: ‘If you dream a thing more than once, it’s sure to come true!”

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Princess aurora

settings.collection-desc: Imagine the world of your dreams with your Disney’s The Little Mermaid inspired Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry. The graceful curves of Ariel’s signature shell sparkle in shining gold and brilliant diamonds!

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: “Who says my dreams have to stay just my dreams?”

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION

settings.small-heading: A tale as old as time.
settings.big-content: As bold as a rose, independent and spirited, Belle knows that true beauty lies within. Belle loves books and dreams of an adventure in the great wide somewhere!

settings.small-heading: At the doorstep of a new adventure. The Heart, Like a Rose, Blossoms When Loved
settings.big-content: Confident in her wit and moral compass, she always worked towards making  a difference in the lives of her loved ones. Together at last, with love and magic on her side, she sways with the Beast and falls in love with the magical adventure she always dreamt off.

settings.collection-desc: Belle jewelry celebrates beauty that shines from inside. Inspired by the spirit of Belle, these Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry engagement rings with touches of warm rose and yellow gold are the perfect choice for a woman who knows where she’s going.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: “I want adventure in the great wide somewhere.”

settings.heading: Discover your inner Princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION

settings.small-heading: “If you had the chance to change your fate, would you?“
settings.big-content: Headstrong Princess Merida is a skilled archer. Determined to forge her own path in life, Merida defies custom and the lords of the land, convinced she can change her fate without compromising her ideals.

settings.collection-desc: Inspired by Disney Pixar™ Brave, Merida’s powerful bow adorns Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry necklaces, rings and earrings that stand out from the crowd with gleaming apatite and sparkling diamonds!

settings.heading: Discover the inner Princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of princess Merida

settings.small-heading: Embark on adventures with utmost courage
settings.big-content: Once upon a time, in a faraway land, adventure was calling. There are new discoveries every day when you explore your world and let courage lead the way.
The key to determining your life’s path, is to trust yourself

settings.collection-desc: Celebrate your inner princess with dazzling designs inspired by the adventures of all your favorite Disney Princesses. Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry ring, necklace, earring and bracelet designs are inspired by castles, crowns, and enchanting destinations. White topaz and diamonds sparkle as you discover a new chapter in your story. Heart details remind you to always dream from your heart. Your next adventure is waiting for you.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: “be the hero of your own adventure!”

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of majestic princess

settings.small-heading: “Once upon a time in a land faraway, at the stately chateau.”
settings.big-content: Pure of heart, kind and graceful, Cinderella believes in dreams that come true. When her father dies, Cinderella is treated as a servant in her own home by her wicked stepmother and stepsisters. Despite a life full of hard work, Cinderella stays kind and joyful, dreaming of a better life.

settings.small-heading: ”A dream is a wish your heart makes.”
settings.big-content: When the King invites every girl in the kingdom to a royal ball so his son Prince Charming may select his bride, her stepmother and stepsisters do everything they can to prevent Cinderella from attending. Then her Fairy Godmother appears, turning her rags into a lovely dress and a pumpkin into a magnificent carriage. After dancing the night away at the ball, Cinderella leaves at the stroke of midnight before the enchantment wears off. She loses one glass slipper, which the Prince uses to find her again. All her dreams come true and they live happily ever after.

settings.collection-desc: Dreams do come true. Create your own fairy tale with romantic jewelry inspired by Disney’s Cinderella. Travel in style in your Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry engagement ring, necklace, ring, earrings and bracelet, no fairy godmother required. Your carriage in shining gold, diamonds, and beautiful blue topaz awaits to sweep you off to dance the night away until the clock strikes midnight. Your own Prince Charming will recognize you by your elegant glass slipper pendant sparkling with diamonds.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: She believes that wishes do come true, with faith in dreams and a great pair of shoes. Her heart can transform everyday life into a fairy tale and begin her own once upon a time. Every bride is Cinderella on her big day, with her beautiful gown and the brilliant beginning of her happily ever after. Her Cinderella jewelry symbolizes her faith in her dreams of a brilliant future.

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION Princess cinderella

settings.small-heading: What matters is to never lose sight of what’s really important!
settings.big-content: In beautiful New Orleans, enterprising young Tiana has a vision of someday opening her own restaurant, inspired by her father’s joy in sharing good food with others. She isn’t afraid of working hard but overwhelming obstacles make her dream seem increasingly impossible.

settings.collection-desc:
Make your own fairy tales come true, inspired by Disney's Princess and the Frog. Wear Tiana's water lily to remember that you too can achieve your dreams.
Tiana Enchanted Disney Fine jewelry nacklaces, rings.

settings.short-desc: Inspired by Disney Princess Tiana, this water lily bloom fashion ring is handcrafted in sterling silver and 10k gold with diamonds encrusted along a spiralled shank.
Behind every majestic princess is their majestic jewellery. These gold lily rings are handcrafted with polished finish!
A magnificent ring for a true princess! This gold ring is handcrafted with gold finish and diamonds!

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: She’s an entrepreneur who dreams of building her own business. She wants to make her family proud. She enjoys bringing people together and nurturing community. She always has an open door and is ready to listen. Tiana designs remind her that nothing is impossible if you work hard and dream big.

settings.heading: Discover the inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Princess Tiana

settings.small-heading: I have Magic Hair That glows When I Sing
settings.big-content:
Kidnapped by Mother Gothel and
trapped in a remote tower since
she was a baby Rapunzel, now
18 years old, has seventy feet of long, magical, golden hair. As she grows up, she wonders about the significance of the floating lights that appear in the sky each year, Rapunzel knows it’s her birthday, she just doesn’t know
the lights are specifically for her.

settings.small-heading: “All at One, Everything Is Different Now That I See You”
settings.big-content:
When the notorious bandit Flynn Rider hides out in her tower, she sees her chance to finally explore the outside world.

Bounty hunters seeking Flynn chase them, but they escape thanks to Rapunzel’s resourcefulness and her magical hair. Later, Rapunzel discovers that the lights are lanterns, released every year by her parents, who have never given up on finding her. She finds her way back to the castle, with the help of Flynn, and is reunited with her family.

settings.collection-desc: Dare to let your hair down with Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry necklaces, rings and earrings inspired by Rapunzel. Her sun symbol is radiant in polished gold and silver. Pale pink Rose de France amethyst expresses her artistic side and diamonds sparkle with her energetic spirit. Wear them and let your light shine.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: When life gives her challenges, she stays true to herself. She’s energetic and resourceful, interested in making things and helping others. She is adventurous, artistic, and fun, inspiring everyone to reach for the sun. Rapunzel designs express her adventurous and creative spirit.

settings.heading: Discover the inner Princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Rapunzel

settings.small-heading: Lips red as the Rose. Hair black as Ebony. Skin white as snow
settings.big-content: With her gentle grace, Snow White charms every creature in the kingdom except her jealous and vain stepmother, the Queen. When the Magic Mirror proclaims Snow White the fairest one of all, the Huntsman tells her she must flee into the forest and never return

settings.small-heading: Epitome of kindness and optimism
settings.big-content: With her resilience, kind heart, and optimism she befriends the forest creatures and the seven dwarfs: Doc, Sneezy, Grumpy, Happy, Bashful, Sleepy and Dopey. When the Queen discovers the deceit she disguises herself into Hag who offers Snow White a poisoned apple. One bite puts her to sleep under a sleeping spell. The heartbroken dwarfs place her in a glass coffin in the woods and mourn for her. The Prince, who had previously fallen in love with Snow White, happens by and awakens her from the wicked Queen’s deathlike spell with true love’s kiss.

settings.collection-desc: Discover new friends in the enchanted forest where all your wishes come true. Live happily ever after adorned in Snow  White’s bow, sparkling with red garnets and diamonds. Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry rings, necklaces and earrings inspired by Disney’s Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, a kind heart is the fairest in the land.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: With a loving nature and a trusting heart, she is kind to all, big and small. She loves animals and nature and has friends everywhere she goes. She dances through life with a gentle grace. Her Snow White jewellery expresses her kind heart and her connection to the world around her and all the creatures in it.

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Princess Snow White

settings.small-heading: The mainland sounds flitterific!
settings.big-content: Tinker Bell is a pixie who lives in Neverland. Feisty and sassy, she’s also a loyal friend to Peter Pan

settings.small-heading: All you need is faith, trust and a little bit of Pixie dust!
settings.big-content: She has the power to enable anyone or anything to fly with a sprinkling of Pixie Dust. As a fairy, she draws her powers from people who believe in her.

settings.collection-desc: Think happy thoughts every day with Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry diamond rings, necklaces and earrings inspired by your favorite feisty fairy, Tinker Bell from Disney’s Peter Pan. A wave of her shining wand makes every day magical. Fly through your dreams on her shining wings adorned with diamonds. Enchanted green tourmaline inspires you to believe anything is possible with faith, trust, and pixie dust.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: Confident and energetic, she isn’t afraid to let you know what she thinks. She’s ready for anything. A caring friend, she’s fun, outgoing, and always ready for a new adventure. Her Tinker Bell jewellery is a symbol of her faith in herself. When she sees that magical star she knows there’s nothing she can’t do with a bit of pixie dust!

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of TInkerbell

settings.small-heading: Every once in a while, right in the middle of an ordinary life, love gives us a fairy tale.
settings.big-content: She meets Aladdin and his mischievous monkey Abu. After he is arrested and thrown in the dungeon, Aladdin escapes with the help of a fellow prisoner, who happens to be the evil Jafar in disguise. He needs Aladdin to steal a magic lamp out of the Cave of Wonders. There, Aladdin finds the lamp, and once the genie is released, he grants Aladdin three wishes. Aladdin’s first wish is to be a prince so he can marry Jasmine. As Prince Ali, they take a magic carpet ride together and fall in love. After defeating Jafar and saving the kingdom, the Sultan changes the laws and Jasmine and Aladdin marry and live happily after.

settings.small-heading: “I am Merida! The firstborn descendant of clan DunBroch, and I’ll be shootin’ for my own hand!”
settings.big-content: When her actions unintentionally create chaos in the kingdom, she must use all her skills and resources, including her clever and mischievous young brothers, to undo a curse and save her clan. Merida’s journey leads her and her mother to understand and respect each other. Merida discovers the true meaning of bravery, rights a wrong, and becomes an advocate for change.

settings.small-heading: “True love conquers all!”
settings.big-content: One day she sees a young man in the forest and they share a moment. She doesn’t know this is her betrothed, Prince Philip. Despite all efforts to protect her, Aurora pricks her finger. Thankfully, Merryweather had altered Maleficent’s curse from death to a deathlike slumber to be woken only by True Love’s Kiss. Phillip rushes to the rescue, battles Maleficent in dragon form, and saves Aurora with true love’s kiss, breaking the curse, waking the kingdom and living happily ever after.

settings.small-heading: Lips red as the Rose. Hair black as Ebony. Skin white as snow
settings.big-content: With her gentle grace, Snow White charms every creature in the kingdom except her jealous and vain stepmother, the Queen. When the Magic Mirror proclaims Snow White the fairest one of all, the Huntsman tells her she must flee into the forest and never return.

settings.small-heading: Epitome of kindness and optimism
settings.big-content:
With her resilience, kind heart, and optimism she befriends the forest creatures and the seven dwarfs: Doc, Sneezy, Grumpy, Happy, Bashful, Sleepy and Dopey. When the Queen discovers the deceit she disguises herself as a hag who offers Snow White a poisoned apple. One bite puts her
under a sleeping spell. The heartbroken dwarfs place her in a glass coffin in the woods and mourn for her. The Prince, who had fallen in love with Snow White, happens by and awakens her from the wicked Queen’s deathlike spell with true love’s kiss.

settings.small-heading: True Love always prospers!
settings.big-content: When the wicked Dr. Facilier transforms Tiana and Prince Naveen into frogs, they flee into the Louisiana Bayou and must learn to work together and overcome their differences to break the curse and regain their human form. Tiana discovers that dreams do come true and what’s most important lies beneath the skin. She honors her father’s memory when she opens Tiana’s Palace Restaurant and Jazz Club on the banks of the Mississippi River.

settings.small-heading: “The moment where bravery unfolds”
settings.big-content: In combat on a snowy mountain pass, her quick thinking saves them all. In a high-stakes battle atop the Imperial Palace, the fate of the Empire rests in her hands. She uses her ingenuity to outwit the Huns and win the battle for all of China. Mulan overcomes the limitations of her tradition-bound society to become an honored legendary warrior.

settings.small-heading: “Fearless and Big Hearted Queen Anna Of Arendelle”
settings.big-content: Princess Anna of Arendelle is Elsa’s carefree younger sister. When Anna falls in love at first sight with Prince Hans at Elsa’s coronation, a dispute between the sisters turns into a national crisis and Elsa flees, after accidentally plunging Arendelle into eternal winter.

settings.small-heading: “Love … is … putting someone else’s needs before yours.”
settings.big-content: Anna goes on a quest to find Elsa and end the winter. She overcomes hardship, makes new friends, and helps Elsa learn the importance of love and family. Anna’s journey inspires us to never give up and to be strong even when it feels impossible.

settings.collection-desc: The freshness of spring blooms in Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry rings, necklaces, and earrings inspired by Anna from Disney’s Frozen. Let Anna’s crocus flowers awaken dreams of new adventures. Anna’s sunny personality shines in pretty pink rhodolite garnet and sparkles in brilliant diamonds.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: Always looking on the bright side, she’s not afraid of expressing herself. Her irresistible charm draws others to her. She’s stronger than she is aware and makes every day an adventure she’s happy to share. Her Anna jewelry expresses her optimism and belief that doing your best will lead to success.

settings.heading: Discover the inner Princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelry
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Princess Anna

settings.small-heading: “Queen Elsa of Arendelle”
settings.big-content:
Elegant, powerful and selfless, Elsa has the strength to overcome fear and learn to be loved. Elsa has the power to create ice and snow.
 As a young girl, she accidentally freezes her sister Anna, and is shut away so as not to hurt  anyone ever again.

settings.small-heading: “Family is all we have.”
settings.big-content: Many years later, after she is crowned Queen, she accidently sends her kingdom into a fierce winter. She has to overcome her fear, control her magical gifts and learn to allow herself to be loved in order to break the spell and save her kingdom.

settings.collection-desc:
Be strong with the icy beauty of Elsa’s snowflake in diamond and
aquamarine. Let love warm your heart with frosty diamonds in beautiful sparkling Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry engagement rings, necklaces, and earrings inspired by Elsa from Disney’s Frozen. Each stunning design is as unique as a snowflake.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: She knows that it takes strength let others in and be vulnerable. Her elegance and style inspires those around her. The cool tones of diamonds and aquamarine are the perfect complement to her regal confidence. Her Elsa jewellery makes a statement that she is powerful and unique.

settings.heading: Discover your inner princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewellery
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION

settings.small-heading: “All around you are spirits, child,” the wise tree would say. “They live in the earth, the water, the sky. If you listen, they will guide you.”
settings.big-content: Bursting with all the vitality of nature, Pocahontas is a free-spirited girl who dreams of carving her own path in life. When the English arrive on the shores near her village, she meets and befriends Captain John Smith, bridging the gap between their two cultures and changing history.

settings.small-heading: “I’ll always be with you. Forever.”
settings.big-content: Pocahontas teaches John Smith to respect the earth and her people and in return she protects him from her concerned tribe. Together they prove both worlds, the old and new, can live together in harmony.

settings.collection-desc: Find your inspiration in Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry rings, necklaces and bracelets with the feather of Pocahontas to remind you that all things are connected. Inspired by Disney’s Pocahontas, the beauty of nature sparkles in earthy smoky quartz and brilliant diamonds. You’ll blaze your own trail when the wind guides you to a new world of adventure.

settings.heading: Which Disney Princess are you?
settings.sub-heading: Curious and adventurous, she chooses her own path and trusts her heart. She has respect for the natural world and sees the beauty all around her. She’s an explorer and trailblazer who goes where the wind takes her. Her Pocahontas jewelry expresses her free spirit.

settings.heading: Discover the inner Princess in you with Enchanted Disney Jewelry
settings.sub-heading: THE INSPIRATION BEHIND THE EXQUISITE COLLECTION of Princess Pocahontas
